channel.title: Hitham Hassam on Computing Club
channel.description: Recent content in Hitham Hassam on Computing Club

item.title: Introduction to debugging `C++` with `gdb`
item.description: The code and slides for Hitham’s session today on basic gdb debugging of C++ can be found at Hitham2496/Computing-Talks. There’s also a recording of the meeting here.
item.content: The code and slides for Hitham’s session today on basic gdb debugging of C++ can be found at Hitham2496/Computing-Talks. There’s also a recording of the meeting here.
